page.title: 09Housing
page.content: {Housing.}All houses in the Meadowood Estate have double garages and a N.H.B.C 10 year protection.Some of the houses on the estate are The Chatsworth,The Berford,The Amberley,The Tonbridge and The Malvern."Maidenhead" is located about two and a half miles to the south west of the picturesque Berkshire town of "Maidenhead" close to open countryside.The Meadowood estate is next to Cox Green.The houses in Meadowood are made out of bricks.The first house was built 4 years ago. My family moved to the area because we like it and we have lived here before. {Bedrooms.}I think that the sizes of the bedrooms in our house are quite good but I wouldn't mind if they were a bit bigger. I would like another room for sitting in when my friends come round.
